answers.answer: I don't know why people are stupid enough to scare some one by saying bs like that. They usually induce women when they have GD. Plus you can always ask to be induced if there really was such a problem cause baby would be fine if he/she were to be born. Stay positive.

I'm sorry for you to hear this, i am type 1 diabetic and my baby is growing fast as well. U just need to be careful of what you eat and especially your bloodpressure is important as well. I understand your stress but i believe they will now start keeping track of the growth of your baby and your health as well. Good luck and may God protect both of you.

You only 4 weeks left and 7lbd is not too bad. If they really think that the baby's life is at risk they will induce you. I've heard that if the baby is over weight you might have difficulties delivering but doesn't mean it'll jeopardize your baby's life.
Thanks To all of you hopefully things turn out good:( and my baby girl will be good.

question: I went to my specialist today and told me my baby weights 7 pounds and 7oz I'm 36 weeks and 3 days. I have gestational diabetes. She says baby is growing to fast and can cause her a problem like die or become sick I'm so sad and frustrated don't know what to do. !! Has anyone else been through this?  :(
title: stressed !! :(
